## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (run `mvn fmt:format`)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass (`mvn clean verify -Pdev`)
- [ ] I have updated the documentation if needed

---

## Suggested Commit Message :tada:

- [What makes a great commit message?](https://chris.beams.io/posts/git-commit/)
- Each line should be limited to 80 characters
- We use the following format:

```
<type>: <subject>

<body (optional)>
```

**Types:** `feat`, `fix`, `docs`, `refactor`, `test`, `chore`

**Example:**
```
feat: Add support for parsing Instant ranges

Add InstantParser to handle java.time.Instant values using ISO-8601 format.
```
